entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 10:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.9°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
